channel.title: Server problem
channel.description:
error when i run run.bat
> [code=java]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException:17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:281) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:113)[/code]
reason for this error and how to fix it?

item.title: Server problem
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

this is because when you try to add a item to item.cfg
you put it in there wrong.so put it in there again!

Read full topic
